column4: So does anyone here have a foolproof way of setting up a wireless network? ;)
It's a Netgear WPN311, trying to connect to a Netgear WPN824 wireless router using 128bit WEP encryption
Apparently i'm meant to have wlan0, but I don't. All I have is eth0, lo and ath0
Hmm, thought there was more there last night.
I've installed ndiswrapper, loaded my windows driver for my card, and I'd like to know how to stop my card using it's current driver and use the one NDIS loaded.
modprobe remove and blacklist the driver
any chance you could give me more detail?
also I did the whole ndiswrapper thing yesterday and im running edgy - I had to compile it from source - the one in the repos would not work
I'm brand new to linux. How do I do the whole modprobe and blacklist thing?
